professional_summary.bio: A creative support professional turned data-focused systems engineer and founder of AiY Music. Skilled at balancing technical troubleshooting with analytics and dashboard building. Combines analytical expertise with artistic entrepreneurship, creating both technical solutions and cultural bridges through music.
professional_summary.unique_value: Combines data science expertise with systems administration skills and creative entrepreneurship through multilingual music production
professional_summary.availability: Currently employed at Walmart; open to data/analytics roles and developer growth paths

responsibilities: Build Tableau dashboards tracking KPIs like first-call resolution, resolution time, and technician availability
Automate reporting and contribute to Tableau Prep workflows
Develop SQL scripts and Tableau insights to streamline Tech Spot operations
Hands-on IT systems administration (Active Directory, VMware, SCCM, WSUS, MDM, VOIP, network connectivity)
impact: Optimized support operations through data-driven KPI dashboards
Streamlined processes with automated reporting workflows
Enhanced operational efficiency with SQL-driven insights
Built foundation for analytics and leadership role at Walmart

key_projects.impact: Significant time savings and improved data accuracy

key_projects.impact: Enhanced operational efficiency and faster issue resolution

faqs.question: What makes Navneet unique?
faqs.answer: Navneet combines technical expertise in data science and systems administration with creative entrepreneurship through AiY Music. His multilingual music production (5 languages) and AI experimentation show innovation across disciplines, while his experience spans retail, tech, healthcare, and non-profits.

faqs.question: How does music relate to his technical work?
faqs.answer: AiY Music demonstrates Navneet's ability to blend traditional elements with modern technology - the same approach he takes in data science. Music production requires pattern recognition, attention to detail, and creative problem-solving, all skills that enhance his analytical work. He's also experimenting with AI tools in creative contexts.

faqs.question: What industries has he worked in?
faqs.answer: Navneet has diverse industry experience including retail (Walmart), technology (Microsoft, SonicWall, Alarm.com), healthcare (Jazz Pharmaceuticals), energy (Bloom Energy), and non-profit (Asia Society). This cross-industry perspective brings valuable insights to any role.

faqs.question: Is he available for new opportunities?
faqs.answer: Navneet is currently employed at Walmart Global Tech but open to discussing data/analytics roles and developer growth opportunities. He's particularly interested in positions that leverage his combined technical and creative skills.

faqs.question: What's his location and remote work preference?
faqs.answer: He's based in Cupertino/Sunnyvale, CA (Silicon Valley). Remote work preferences aren't specified, so that would be worth discussing directly with him based on the specific opportunity.

conversation_starters: Navneet combines data science expertise with creative entrepreneurship through AiY Music
He's experimented with AI tools in both analytical and creative contexts
His multilingual background (5 languages through music) brings unique cultural perspective
He's built systems that track KPIs and automate reporting workflows
